title: Data Science in Action
section: What was I doing before Monday?
text:
What was I doing before Monday?

Research Scientist at the Minnesota Department of Human Services (2016 - 2023)
Data Scientist with the Office of Evaluation Science at the US General Services Administration (2022-2023)
Senior Research and Training Manager at the Adbul Latif Jameel Poverty Action Lab at MIT (2010-2016)

title: Data Science in Action
text:
Some cool data science projects

Minnesota Self-Support Index
Minnesota Emergency SNAP
US General Services Administration Work Patterns

title: Data Science in Action
text:
Minnesota Self-Support Index

State performance measure of family case assistance
Score compared to range of expected performance
Clustered bootstrap creating agency predictions
Trained local agencies
Tested the measure and incorporated new data

title: Data Science in Action
text:
Minnesota Emergency SNAP1

Provided participants with maximum benefit regardless of income
Calculated additional benefits
Prepared files to issue benefits
Reports of the amount issued
Updated based on changing policy and IT solutions

Presentation at NAWRS 2023 in Salt Lake City: Minnesota Emergency SNAP Data Story

title: Data Science in Action
text:
US GSA Work Patterns

Categorized employee work patterns based on remote or office
Daily data where employees declare where they are working from
K-means cluster to group employees
Preparing memo for publication

title: Data Science in Action
text:

University of Minnesota Applied Economics

title: Data Science in Action
text:
Questions to ask

What is the supervisor and team like?
How available is the data?
How good is the IT infrastructure?
Do I care about what we are doing?
What methods am I using?
